articles.author: Andrea Vacchiano
articles.title: Elon Musk predicts crewed SpaceX flights to Mars by 2028, hopes for 'self-sustaining city' on planet - Fox Business
articles.description: Elon Musk predicted Saturday that crewed flights to Mars could begin within the next four years, with sustainable human settlements on Mars possibly beginning within two decades.
articles.content: SpaceX founder Elon Musk made bold predictions about human life on Mars in a series of social media posts on Saturday.

articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Apple Watch Series 10 Will Boast Unexpected New Feature, Report Says - Forbes
articles.description: With just days to go before the next Apple Watch is unveiled, a new report says that new sensors and a surprise health function will be on board.
articles.content: The next Apple Watch series will include two models with new sensors, it seems. Apple Watch Series 10 and Apple Watch Ultra 3 are reported to have a new heart rate and ECG sensor.

articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: How to watch Apple’s ‘Glowtime’ iPhone 16 event - The Verge
articles.description: Apple is preparing to launch the iPhone 16 and 16 Pro lineup on September 9th, along with release dates for iOS 18 and its Apple Intelligence features.
articles.content:
How to watch Apples Glowtime iPhone 16 event
How to watch Apples Glowtime iPhone 16 event
 / Apple will be streaming the event on its website, in the Apple TV app, and on YouTube.

articles.author: Tyler Fischer
articles.title: GTA 6 Song Request Turned Down by Musician Offended by $7,500 Offer - ComicBook.com
articles.description: Don't expect to hear this song in GTA 6.
articles.content: According to musician Martyn Ware, Rockstar Games recently approached them to put one of his songs in Grand Theft Auto 6. That said, the offer-- $7,500

articles.author: Michael Burkhardt
articles.title: Five things to expect with Apple’s new M4 Mac lineup this fall - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple is expected to begin unveiling their M4 Mac lineup as soon as October, with updates to the iMac, MacBook...
articles.content: Apple is expected to begin unveiling their M4 Mac lineup as soon as October, with updates to the iMac, MacBook Pro, and Mac mini to start off the new M4 transition

articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.title: Nanoleaf finally launches a smart switch after eight years of trying - The Verge
articles.description: The Sense Plus Smart Switch is a physical device that controls your Nanoleaf lights. It works over Litewave and Thread and supports Apple Home and SmartThings through Matter.
articles.content: Nanoleaf finally launches a smart switch after eight years of trying
